mapper.select: select rownum, order_at,id, name,phone, merchandise_name, total_price, state, b.count from (select rownum, order_at,id, name,phone, merchandise_name, total_price, state from(select order_at,id, name,phone, max(merchandise) merchandise_name, total_price, state from (select o.order_at, o.id, o.name, o.phone, m.name merchandise, o.total_price, o.state from alz_order o inner join alz_order_detail d on o.id = d.order_id inner join alz_merchandise_detail m on m.id = d.merchandise_id where d.order_id = o.id and o.user_id = d.user_id order by order_at desc) group by order_at,id, name,phone, total_price, state order by order_at) order by rownum desc) a, (SELECT order_id, COUNT(*)count FROM alz_order_detail GROUP BY order_id) b where a.id = b.order_id
